cause.description:
Global Warming has came into our lives and we need to stop it. If we don't stop it our kids wont have life on the planet and then temperature of the earth will rise with will make out planet much hot if prevents more sickness.More and More bugs has increase by the temperatures.To stop Global Warming we need to use Compact Fluorescent Light Bulb in the houses and we need to recycle (glass, paper, aluminium, asphalt, iron,printer ink cartridges & toners , textiles and plastics).If we all planet a tree in our backyard it will help us reducing carbon dioxide.
1. Cut down use less Co2
cause.mission: Saving The Earth From Global Warming
cause.name: Saving The Earth From Global Warming
